author: Staff Reporter
text:
M. Shalini (15), daughter of construction worker Manikandan, allegedly set herself ablaze at her residence in Ammapalayam near Palladam on Friday.

Police sources said that she took the extreme step after her parents decided to put her in a boarding school at Thondamuthur under Kundadam block in the district.

Didn’t want to study further

The girl reportedly was upset as she did not want to continue studies.
title: Student ends life
